New Records: Jordan Walker became the first player in nearly 100 years to go 5-for-5 with a home run, three RBI, four runs, and a stolen base against the New York Yankees
Key Match Events: Jordan Walker's historic performance led the St. Louis Cardinals to a 14-7 win against the New York Yankees, claiming the series and hanging around in the NL Wild Card race
Post-Match Reflections: Walker's historic showing on Sunday was certainly a good start, but he won't be able to salvage his 2024 campaign enough to match his 2023 numbers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cardinals are set to open another road series against the Milwaukee Brewers on Monday
Walker is the only one of the three to also steal a base in the same game
Others: Walker has spent most of this season in the minors after struggling coming out of the gates in April
Walker hit.276 with 16 home runs, 51 RBI, seven stolen bases, a.787 OPS in 117 games in 2023
